articles.title: 'I am heartbroken': Tourist spends week at Dublin Airport trying to find lost luggage containing parents' ashes - Independent.ie
articles.description: American tourist Donna O’Connor travelled to Ireland to spread some of her parents’ ashes on a family farm.
articles.content:
American tourist Donna OConnor travelled to Ireland to spread some of her parents ashes on a family farm.
But now she has described the chaotic experience of trying to locate her lost baggage at Dub… [+5383 chars]

articles.title: The Decline Of The American Work Ethic Will Exacerbate The Recession - The Federalist
articles.description: Americans have clearly gotten used to not working and have chosen to live off the pandemic welfare that remains rather than return to the workforce.
